about_the_game:
To And Fro is a vibrant VR action-adventure 3D platformer where you can explore a vast, colorful world filled with treasures and secrets waiting to be uncovered. Step into the shoes of our hero, Joe, and utilize his unique abilities to navigate diverse landscapes and challenges. This cozy and casual game features easy-to-pick-up gameplay, making it perfect fun for players of all ages.

Immerse yourself in a relaxing and atmospheric quest, featuring impressionistic, low poly graphics reminiscent of the N64-style. Discover the unparalleled depth and immersion that only VR can offer, allowing you to effortlessly gauge distance and hop between platforms with pinpoint accuracy. VR perspective brings the world to life in a way that flat-screen 3D platformers simply cannot match.

Take control from a captivating third-person perspective, where you directly influence the character you observe. Seamlessly adjust your position and angle of view, offering a fluid and intuitive way to guide your player through the adventure, all while enjoying a dynamic and immersive gameplay experience.

Dive into a world of adventure with To And Fro!

name: To and Fro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An action adventure 3D platformer game in VR. Run, jump, swim, and climb through a lush, colorful world. Collect an assortment of items and power up abilities to access new areas.
